A Desperate Escape

Raskolnikov, panicked, hears footsteps approaching.  
‘Good heavens! What am I to do?’  
He opens the door and slips out.  

---  

Raskolnikov rushes down the stairs.  
‘Hey there! Catch the brute!’  
Voices echo; he feels trapped.  

---  

‘Mitka! Blast him!’  
Men are climbing the stairs fast.  
He sees an open flat—hope!

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov, filled with despair, faces a critical moment of potential discovery as he navigates a tense situation in the stairwell.
